info.description: This is an API documentation for go leaderpro
info.title: Go LeaderPro API

post.description: Login user and return user data with authentication tokens
Generate a new access token using the refresh token

get.description: Get all companies for the authenticated user

post.description: Send a message to the AI leadership coach for advice and guidance

get.description: Get usage statistics and costs for AI features

post.description: Provide feedback (helpful/not helpful) about an AI response

get.description: Get dashboard data with people and statistics for a specific company

parameters.description: Company UUID to get dashboard data
parameters.name: company_uuid

get.description: Get all people in the company, optionally filtered by search

post.description: Create a new person in the company
Send a message to the AI with context about a specific person
post.summary: Chat with AI about specific person

get.description: Get notes where this person was mentioned (feedbacks received)

post.description: Create a new note (1:1, feedback, or observation) for a person
post.summary: Create a note for a person

put.description: Update an existing note (1:1, feedback, or observation) by UUID

delete.description: Delete an existing note (1:1, feedback, or observation) by UUID

get.description: Get timeline of direct notes for a person (1:1s and observations, excluding feedbacks/mentions)
Ping the server to check if it is alive

post.description: Create a new user account and return authentication tokens

person_id.description: UUID da pessoa sobre quem a nota foi feita

person_name.description: Nome da pessoa sobre quem a nota foi feita

source_person_name.description: Para mentions: pessoa sobre quem falou
